               throws java.io.IOException
Handles the binding of the server to the address.

Specified by:
doBind in class AbstractServer
Throws:
java.io.IOException

handleAccept

public void handleAccept()
Notifies the server/client it can now accept clients on its socket. This should not be invoked outside of the server/clients worker/acceptor.

onClose

protected void onClose()
                throws java.io.IOException
Handles the closing of the server. This will only be invoked once.

Specified by:
onClose in class AbstractServer
Throws:
java.io.IOException

getSocket

public java.nio.channels.ServerSocketChannel getSocket()
The Socket of the server, This may be many different things according to the server implementation.

Returns:
The reference to the socket object the server is accepting on.

handleConnect

public void handleConnect()
Notifies the server/client it can now complete its pending connection. This should not be invoked outside of the server/clients worker/acceptor.

handleRead

public void handleRead()
Notifies the server/client that it can now read from its socket. This should not be invoked outside of the server/clients worker/acceptor.

handleWrite

public void handleWrite()
Notifies the server/client that it can now write to its socket. This should not be invoked outside of the server/clients worker/acceptor.
